cpl.name: TiddlyFlex
cpl.title: $:/plugins/BTC/TiddlyFlex
cpl.description: Flexbox Layout for TiddlyWiki5, a multi-column layout  用于 TW5 的 Flexbox 布局，一个多栏布局
cpl.readme:
A flexbox Layout which is inspired by the MultiColumn Layout but should be cleaner, simpler, faster and straight forward.

# easy to use
# optional headers and footers by tag
# responsive flexbox
# sidebar sliding in and out
# two (or more?) stories side by side (optionally only one?)
# reliable scrolling to tiddlers in the currently active column

---

一个 flexbox 布局，它的灵感来源于多栏布局，但应该更干净、更简单、更快速、更直接。

# 易于使用
# 可根据标签选择页眉和页脚
# 响应式柔性方框
# 侧边栏滑入滑出
# 两个（或更多）故事并排（可选只有一个？）
# 可靠地滚动到当前活动栏中的条目
